Posts.Content: robinlori wrote: Hi Everyone, I am having bilateral mastectomy, no reconstruction, on May 9. I am concerned about the tightness that I have heard about around the chest after surgery. I will not have tissue expanders so will the tightness be less? I have severe GERD and cannot tolerate wearing bra because it aggravates my symptoms. I am worried that the chest tightness will aggravate my GERD symptoms as well. Thanks for your response! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: tightness in chest after bilat mast. no reconstr. robinlori mselli

Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2016 11:05PM robinlori wrote: Thank you for your encouraging response!
